text: Jacques Golliet (14 December 1931 – 31 October 2020) was a French politician. He was a Senator from Haute-Savoie from 28 September 1986 to 1 October 1995. He also was Mayor of Thônes from 1974 to 1983. Golliet was a member of the Union for French Democracy and Centre of Social Democrats. Golliet died on 31 October 2020, aged 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Jacques Golliet
